title: About
text:
Hi! I am Yichen Wang, a student at UCLA. Apart from my studies, I am passionate about art and culture. I run the Cicadas Chinese Calligraphy Club at UCLA, where we celebrate the beauty of traditional Chinese calligraphy and share it with the community.
You can explore our work and learn more about the club on our Instagram page.
Feel free to reach out if you’d like to learn more or collaborate!

title: Yichen(Cheney) Wang
text: I am a senior student majoring in Applied Mathematics and Statistics at UCLA. I am also one of the founders of the Cicadas Chinese Calligraphy Club at UCLA. Being a data science enthusiast, I have worked on various machine learning projects and have a strong interest in financial engineering.

title: Yichen(Cheney) Wang
text:
Education

University of California, Los Angeles

Bachelor of Science in Applied Mathematics and Statistics & Data Science
